entries.name: Constellation Revisit Optimization
entries.description: Optimize orbital planes and tasking windows for target revisit goals.

entries.name: SAR Interferometry (InSAR)
entries.description: High-value deformation monitoring technique across large regions.

entries.name: Onboard Edge AI Inference
entries.description: Run inference near the sensor to reduce downlink pressure and latency.

entries.name: Cross-Sensor Fusion Pipelines
entries.description: Fuse optical, SAR, and thermal feeds into unified analytic products.

entries.name: Manual-Only Mission Planning
entries.description: Avoid for modern constellations where scale requires automation.
